package.name: silverstripe/blog
package.description: A fresh take on blogging in Silverstripe set out to tackle the issue of a cluttered Site Tree.

dev-master.name: silverstripe/blog
dev-master.description: A fresh take on blogging in Silverstripe set out to tackle the issue of a cluttered Site Tree.

suggest.silverstripe\/widgets: Some widgets come with the blog which are compatible with the widgets module.
suggest.silverstripe\/comments: This module adds comments to your blog.

dev-revert-256-pulls\/fix-migration.name: silverstripe/blog
dev-revert-256-pulls\/fix-migration.description: A fresh take on blogging in Silverstripe set out to tackle the issue of a cluttered Site Tree.

suggest.silverstripe\/widgets: Some widgets come with the blog which are compatible with the widgets module.
suggest.silverstripe\/comments: This module adds comments to your blog.

1.0.x-dev.name: silverstripe/blog
1.0.x-dev.description: The blog module allows you to post blogs on your SilverStripe. It includes the ability to post blogs using a site front-end form. Blogs are summarised on the blog holder page type, with more detail viewable when a specific blog is clicked.

suggest.silverstripe\/widgets: Additional 'sidebar features', e.g. a list of recent posts and a tagcloud
suggest.silverstripe\/comments: Enable user comments on any page type, including blog posts
suggest.simplepie\/simplepie: Parse RSS feeds, required for the RSS widget
